snippet: Japan Society offers children a chance to give something to the children of Tohoku, Japan, part of a monthlong initiative to commemorate the first anniversary of the Japanese earthquake and tsunami.
lead_paragraph: Japan Society offers children a chance to give something to the children of Tohoku, Japan, part of a monthlong initiative to commemorate the first anniversary of the Japanese earthquake and tsunami.

headline.seo: ‘A Day of Reflection’ at Japan Society‘A Day of Reflection’ at Japan Society
